name: Hello World PICO
description:
Alexis's boyfriend Ishara has gone missing!

... haven't we already done this before? This Hello World game is a demake of my first Hello World game for the PICO-8 Fantasy Console.

Game Controls

Use the arrow keys to move around. You can access the main menu by pressing Enter.

Version History
  • v1.0.0 - 8/30/16
    • First release! Again! Hello World! Again!
Credits

This game was developed using PICO-8. All of the graphics, sound, and music were developed by me!

PICO-8 engine: Copyright 2014-2016 Lexaloffle Games
